welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Point, USA! Get ready to experience the unique charm of our city, known for its friendly locals, delicious southern cuisine, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that East Point has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at College Park Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights within the United States.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights coming into and out of the United States.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fulton County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport handles all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
